headline: Robinhood vs Do Kwon: SEC Clarifies on Stock Tokens
summary: The US Securities and Exchange Commission released a comprehensive classification framework for tokenized securities on the same day Robinhood’s CEO publicly called for stock market tokenization. Meanwhile, Terra’s Mirror Protocol—the first large-scale experiment in synthetic tokenized securities—ended with over $40 billion in investor losses and its founder’s guilty plea, underscoring the urgent need for regulatory
